description.french: Trouvez tous les enregistrements de Thomas Adams.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las entradas del diario de Thomas Adams.

displayName.japanese: 作業台の職人の中の職人
displayName.spanish: Artesano de la mesa de trabajo

description.schinese: 制作了25个部件
description.brazilian: Fabricou 25 peças

description.tchinese: 升級了茱兒的能量步槍

description.english: Max out a Friendly Corebot to level 30

description.spanish: Aumenta a un núcleobot amistoso al nivel 30.

description.schinese: 收集50000个伊甸自转器

description.italian: Raccogli 50.000 unità di E-Turner
description.french: Récupérez 50 000 unités d'édénite.
description.spanish: Reúne 50 000 de gaso-E.

description.tchinese: 恢復了標塔 512 的電力

description.italian: Hai ridato energia al pilone 512
description.french: Vous avez réactivé le pylône 512.
description.spanish: Restauraste la energía del pilón 512.
description.german: Du hast Pylon 512 mit Energie versorgt.

description.english: Find all Hardware pickups in Lonely Basin after Pylon 512 is repaired
description.tchinese: 在標塔 512 修好後，找到孤獨盆地中的所有硬體拾取物

description.german: Finde alle Hardwarepickups im einsamen Becken nach Reparatur von Pylon 512.

description.english: Smash something using the AP-3 Frame

description.japanese: 流砂でハードウェアを全て回収する
description.italian: Trova tutti i pezzi di hardware nelle Sabbie mutevoli
description.french: Trouvez tout le matériel dans les Dunes changeantes.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las piezas de hardware de las arenas movedizas.

displayName.japanese: 仲間は多いほど楽しい

description.schinese: 塞思加入焦耳的队伍
description.brazilian: Seth entra na equipe de Joule
description.japanese: セスがジュールのパーティーに参加する
description.italian: Seth entra a far parte della squadra di Joule
description.french: Ajoutez Seth au groupe de Joule.
description.spanish: Seth se une al grupo de Joule.

description.english: Defeat Victor at the Bottom of the E-Tower
description.tchinese: 在伊塔底層打敗維克多
description.schinese: 在伊甸塔底层击败维克多
description.brazilian: Derrote Victor na parte inferior da Torre E
description.japanese: エデンの塔の最下層でビクターを倒す
description.italian: Sconfiggi Victor in fondo alla Torre-E
description.french: Battez Viktor au pied de la tour E.
description.spanish: Derrota a Victor en la base de la Torre E.
description.german: Besiege Victor am Grund des E-Turms.

description.english: Max out one friendly Core through Core Fusion
description.tchinese: 透過核心融合將一個己方核心提升到最高等級
description.schinese: 通过核心聚变将一个友好核心提升到最高等级
description.russian: Развить одно дружественное ядро до максимума с помощью конденсата
description.brazilian: Maximize um núcleo amigável por meio da fusão de núcleos
description.koreana: 코어 퓨전으로 아군 코어봇 1기 최고 레벨 달성하기
description.japanese: コアフュージョンで味方のコア 1 体を最大にする
description.italian: Porta un nucleo amico al livello massimo con la fusione
description.french: Améliorez un orbe ami au maximum avec la fusion d'orbe.
description.spanish: Aumenta al máximo un núcleo amistoso con la fusión de núcleos.
description.german: Erhöhe einen freundlichen Kern durch Kernfusion maximal.

description.english: Dig up 10 items using a K-9 Frame
description.tchinese: 使用 K-9 骨架挖出 10 件物品
description.schinese: 使用K-9框架挖出10个物品
description.russian: Откопать с помощью каркаса П-3С 10 предметов
description.brazilian: Escave 10 itens usando uma armação K-9
description.japanese: K-9 フレームを使ってアイテムを 10 個掘り出す
description.italian: Trova 10 oggetti con un telaio K-9
description.french: Trouvez 10 objets en utilisant une structure CYN-0.
description.spanish: Desentierra 10 objetos con un cuerpo K-9.
description.german: Grabe 10 Gegenstände mit einer K-9-Hülle aus.

description.english: Find all of Natalie Bright's log book entries
description.tchinese: 找到所有的娜塔麗布萊特日誌記錄檔
description.schinese: 找到娜塔莉・布莱特所有的日志记录
description.russian: Найти все записи из дневника Натали Брайт
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os livros de registro de Natalie Bright
description.japanese: ナタリー・ブライトの本のページを全て見つける
description.italian: Trova tutte le parti del diario di Natalia Bright
description.french: Trouvez tous les enregistrements de Natalie Bright.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las entradas del registro de Natalie Bright.
description.german: Finde alle von Natalie Brights Protokollbucheinträgen.

displayName.japanese: やってみよう、バイオレット！

description.schinese: 使用一个快速移动站
description.brazilian: Use uma estação de viagem rápida
description.japanese: ファストトラベルステーションを使用する
description.italian: Usa una postazione di Viaggio rapido
description.french: Utilisez une station de transport rapide.
description.spanish: Usa la estación de viaje rápido.

description.english: Extract a Core from an enemy
description.tchinese: 從敵人身上提取一個核心
description.schinese: 从敌人那里抽出一个核心
description.brazilian: Extraia um núcleo de um inimigo
description.japanese: 敵のコアを抽出する
description.italian: Estrai un nucleo da un nemico
description.french: Réussissez à extraire l'orbe d'un ennemi.
description.spanish: Extrae el núcleo de un enemigo.
description.german: Extrahiere einen Kern aus einem Gegner.

description.schinese: 解锁T8-NK框架
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a armação T8-NK
description.japanese: T8-NK フレームを解除する
description.italian: Sblocca il telaio T8-NK
description.french: Déverrouillez la structure T4-NK.
description.spanish: Desbloquea el cuerpo T8-NK.

description.italian: Completa il dungeon ‘Danza del diavolo’
description.french: Terminez le donjon
description.spanish: Completa el calabozo ‘Danza del Diablo.’

displayName.brazilian: Eu tenho um tanque na manga
displayName.french: Tank il y a de l'espoir

description.english: Command each Core companion to do a T8-NK Lethal
description.tchinese: 命令每一個核心同伴發動 T8-NK 致命攻擊
description.schinese: 命令每一个核心同伴发动T8-NK致命攻击
description.russian: Скомандовать каждому спутнику выполнить смертельную атаку Т4-НК
description.brazilian: Comande cada Núcleo companheiro a usar o letal de T8-NK
description.koreana: T8-NK 치명타를 이행하도록 모든 코어 동료에게 명령
description.japanese: 仲間のコアそれぞれに T8-NK のリーサル攻撃をさせる
description.italian: Ordina a ogni compagno di eseguire un attacco letale T8-NK
description.french: Ordonnez à chacun de vos compagnons d'effectuer un coup fatal T4-NK.
description.spanish: Ordena a todos tus compañeros realizar un letal con un T8-NK.
description.german: Befiehl allen Kern-Begleitern einen tödlichen T8-NK-Angriff.

displayName.japanese: オブシディアンの黒い目

description.english: Defeat the leader of the Obsidian Cult
description.tchinese: 打倒黑曜石小隊的領袖
description.schinese: 击败黑曜石团体的首领
description.brazilian: Derrote o líder do Culto Obsidiano
description.japanese: オブシディアンカルトのリーダーを倒す
description.italian: Sconfiggi il leader del Culto d'ossidiana
description.french: Terrassez le chef du Culte d'obsidienne.
description.spanish: Derrota al líder del Culto Obsidiano.

description.schinese: 在180秒内完成地下城‘摇摇欲坠’任务
description.russian: Пройти подземелье ‘Развалины’ за 180 секунд или быстрее
description.brazilian: Conclua a masmorra ‘Ruínas’ em 180 segundos
description.japanese: ダンジョン「タンブルダウン」を 180 秒以内にクリアする
description.italian: Completa il dungeon ‘La Caduta’ in 180 secondi
description.french: Terminez le donjon
description.spanish: Despeja el calabozo ‘Precipicio’ en 180 segundos.

description.english: Kill an enemy corebot with a Lobb Shot that spends 3 seconds in flight
description.tchinese: 使用飛行時間達 3 秒的高拋彈殺死 1 個敵方核心機器人
description.schinese: 使用飞行3秒的高吊射击杀死一个敌方核心机器人
description.russian: Убить вражеского ядро-бота ‘Выстрелом по дуге’ длительностью в 3 секунды
description.brazilian: Mate um Nucleobot inimigo com um Tiro Arqueado que passe 3 segundos no ar
description.koreana: 전투 중 3초 동안 로브샷으로 적의 코어봇 죽이기
description.japanese: 3 秒以上空中を行くロブショットで敵コアボットを倒す
description.italian: Uccidi un nucleobot ostile con un colpo ad arco che passa 3 secondi in volo
description.french: Tuez un orbot ennemi avec un Tir lobé dont le projectile est resté 3 secondes en l'air.
description.spanish: Elimina un núcleobot enemigo con un Disparo en arco que dure 3 segundos en el aire.
description.german: Eliminiere einen gegnerischen Kern-Bot mit einem Steilschuss mit 3 Sekunden Flugzeit.

displayName.japanese: スプリット・フォーカス

description.english: Kill 3 enemy corebots in less than 1 second with the Split Shot
description.tchinese: 在 1 秒內使用分裂彈殺死 3 個敵方核心機器人
description.schinese: 在一秒内使用分散射击杀死3个敌方核心机器人
description.russian: Убить 3 вражеских ядро-ботов ‘Раздельным выстрелом’ быстрее чем за секунду
description.brazilian: Mate 3 Nucleobots inimigos em menos de um segundo com o Tiro Dividido
description.japanese: スプリットショットで 1 秒以内に 3 体の敵コアボットを倒す
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nucleobot ostili in meno di 1 secondo col colpo diviso
description.french: Tuez 3 orbots ennemis en moins d'une seconde avec le Multi-tir.
description.spanish: Elimina 3 núcleobots enemigos en menos de 1 segundo con Disparo dividido.
description.german: Eliminiere 3 gegnerische Kern-Bots in weniger als 1 Sekunde mit dem Spaltschuss.

description.english: Kill 3 enemy corebots in less than 1 second with the Chrome Shot
description.tchinese: 在 1 秒內使用鉻彈殺死 3 個核心機器人
description.schinese: 在一秒内使用铬制射击杀死3个敌方核心机器人
description.russian: Убить 3 вражеских ядро-ботов ‘Грозой хрома’ быстрее чем за секунду
description.brazilian: Mate 3 Nucleobots inimigos em menos de um segundo com o Tiro Cromado
description.japanese: クロムショットで 1 秒以内に 3 体の敵コアボットを倒す
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nucleobot ostili in meno di 1 secondo col colpo cromato
description.french: Tuez 3 orbots ennemis en moins d'une seconde avec le Tir antichrome.
description.spanish: Elimina 3 núcleobots enemigos en menos de 1 segundo con Disparo de cromo.
description.german: Eliminiere 3 gegnerische Kern-Bots in weniger als 1 Sekunde mit dem Chromschuss.

description.english: Find all Hardware Pickups in the Starving Sea
description.tchinese: 在飢餓海找到所有硬體拾取物
description.schinese: 在饥饿海洋找到所有掉落硬件
description.russian: Найти все железо в Море страждущих
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os hardwares no Mar Faminto
description.koreana: 굶주린 바다에서 모든 하드웨어 습득물 찾기
description.japanese: 貪欲の海でハードウェアを全て回収する
description.italian: Trova tutti i pezzi di hardware nel Mare famelico
description.french: Trouvez tout le matériel dans la mer de la Désolation.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las piezas de hardware del Mar del Hambre.
description.german: Finde alle Hardwarepickups in der Hungersee.
